title: More Bad Times
lyrics:
Fell on my head as I looked for you last night
When the police came
Well they robbed me good
Went to the hospital
The doctor said he had no time for me
And the pills that they gave me

Well they were too weak



More

Bad times

More

Bad times



Well if I'm all wrong I will admit it alright

But there's somethin' that I want to say

That's been on my mind

When everything goes wrong

We treat each other so kind

When everything is bad

We get along some nights



More

Bad times

More

Bad times
